name: Retrospective
description:
A retro-style platformer with 3D perspective and a level editor.

Gamepad Controls:

  • Left Stick (or hat) - Movement
  • A - Jump
  • B - Deploy bomb

Keyboard Controls:

  • WASD (or arrow keys) - Movement
  • Spacebar - Jump
  • Right Shift - Deploy bomb

The key bindings for jump and deploy bomb can be changed in the options menu.

Editor Controls:

  • ESC - Toggle menu
  • 1 - Platforms
  • 2 - Spikes
  • 3 - Collectables
  • 4 - Enemies
  • 5 - Spawn/Exit
  • Click - Paint
  • Right Click - Erase
  • MouseWheel - Zoom
  • Middle Click - Pan
  • Space+Click - Pan

The editor stores the level data as plain text files in the "data/levels" directory of your installation so that you can share them with friends by email, in a forum or whatever... but please be aware they will be deleted if/when you uninstall the game.
